concept.title: Pipeline Error Record Handling
concept.shortdesc: Pipeline error record handling determines how the processes error records that stages send to the pipeline for error handling. It also handles records deliberately dropped from the pipeline such as records without required fields.

conbody.p:
pipelineserror record handlingThe pipeline provides the following error record handling options:
Discard The pipeline discards the record. The includes the records in error record counts and metrics.
Write to File The pipeline writes error records and related details to a local directory. The includes the records in error record counts and metrics. You define the directory to use and the maximum file size. Error files are named based on the File Prefix pipeline property. Write to file is not supported for cluster mode pipelines at this time.
Write to Kafka The pipeline writes error records and related details to Kafka. The includes the records in error record counts and metrics. You define the configuration properties for the Kafka cluster to use.
When a encounters an unexpected error, it stops the pipeline and logs the error.
